definition: Modesty leads to progress, arrogance makes you drop behind (favorite slogan of Mao Zedong)
pinyin: xu1 xin1 shi3 ren2 jin4 bu4 , jiao1 ao4 shi3 ren2 luo4 hou4
traditional: 虛心使人進步，驕傲使人落後
word: 虚心使人进步，骄傲使人落后

definition: emptiness/void/abstract theory or guiding principles/empty or unoccupied/diffident or timid/false/humble or modest/(of health) weak/virtual/in vain
